definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: company, association, spell—abs. [[חָָבֶר]] De 18:11 + 2 t.; cstr. [[חֶבֶר]] Ho 6:9; pl. [[חֲבָרִים]] Ps 58:6, sf. [[חֲבָרַיִךְ]] Is 47:9, Is 47:11—
association, society (abstr.), only in [[בֵּית חָָבֶר]] Pr 21:9 = Pr 25:24 house of association, i. e. shared with a contentious woman (house in common, v.RVm VB).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as acc. cogn. c. [[חָבַר]] (q. v.) De 18:11, Ps 58:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: alone, of Babylonian magic Is 47:9, Is 47:11 (v. Len Chald. Magic [l878]; Magie u. Wahrsage-kunst 1878; Scholz:Götzendienst u. Zauberwesen, 1877. 80 ff. Say:TBA iii. 145 ff and Rel,. Bab 396 ff., 440 ff.).
